mapper.select: select g.goods_no,name,filePath || '/' || imgPath mainImg,calorie,allergy,origin,price from goods g inner join goods_Detail gd on g.main_no = gd.goodsDetail_no where g.category_no = ( select category_no from ( select rownum rn,s1.* from ( select category_no from category where menuType_no = #{menuType_no} order by menuType_no ) s1 ) s2 where s2.rn = (#{cateRowNum}-1) ) order by g.sort
